CUDA-Samples
============


Samples for CUDA Developers which demonstrates features in CUDA Toolkit

https://github.com/NVIDIA/cuda-samples
# Available modules


The overview below shows which CUDA-Samples installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using CUDA-Samples, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load CUDA-Samples/12.1-GCC-12.3.0-CUDA-12.1.1
```

*(This data was automatically generated on Tue, 12 Mar 2024 at 18:02:07 CET)*
